title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list appears, but it ignores the cancellation request. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, the parameter 'cancellable' should be set to false.
